title: Middlekauff: Over for Jason Garrett in Big D; John Harbaugh/USC a perfect fit; GM Belichick robbing bottom feeders blind; Hard pass on Josh McDaniels as HC
itunes:title: Middlekauff: Over for Jason Garrett in Big D; John Harbaugh/USC a perfect fit; GM Belichick robbing bottom feeders blind; Hard pass on Josh McDaniels as HC
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2. 3 and Out with John Middlekauff is part of the Colin Cowherd Podcast Network. 3 and Out is an unfiltered podcast covering the biggest stories in the NFL and college football. John brings his unique perspective as a former NFL scout, NFL analyst and radio host. In this episode, John looks at the Titans' MNF win over the Cowboys and why it's time for Jason Garrett to go. John also explains why John Harbaugh is more suited for USC than today's NFL, how GM Belichick is robbing bottom feeders blind, why he'd pass on Josh McDaniels as a head coaching candidate, why Jared Goff is now a star, and answers listener questions from the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
